// Хук для отслеживания кликов вне зоны компонента
import{useEffect,useRef}from'react';export function useOutsideClick(onOutsideClick){const ref=useRef();useEffect(()=>{function handleClick(event){if(ref.current&&!ref.current.contains(event.target)){onOutsideClick();}}document.addEventListener('mousedown',handleClick);return()=>{document.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleClick);};},[onOutsideClick]);return ref;}
